entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to rain showers or flurries this morning and ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
